data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: When John was a kid, he used to joke around a lot. He ____ social ____ talked ____ everyone, and ____ us ____ laugh. He ____ become a lot ____ serious ____ he ____ gotten ____. But occasionally, he will still tell some jokes and sound like the old John.
data.partBlankContent: When John was a kid, he used to joke around a lot. He w__ social a__ talked t_ everyone, and ma__ us a__ laugh. He h__ become a lot mo__ serious a_ he h__ gotten ol___. But occasionally, he will still tell some jokes and sound like the old John.
data.answer: 当约翰还是个孩子的时候，他经常开玩笑。他善于交际，和每个人聊天，逗得我们都笑。随着年龄的增长，他变得严肃多了。但偶尔，他还是会讲一些笑话，听起来像老约翰。
